list_definition.definition: a game that you play on a special machine with a sloping board. Players try to score points by using two buttons at the side to make a ball hit targets and stop it from reaching the bottom and going out of play

list_ex_of_english: It is the tale of a pinball machine purist's encounter with a very unusual video game.
When he came flying toward you with the puck on his stick, his eyes were all lit up, flashing and gleaming like a pinball machine.
Additionally, the pinball machine based on the film, is the best-selling and the highest produced pinball machine of all time.
It showed a fullscreen high resolution display of a pinball game table.
Fourthly, we will limit the duty to video machines, quiz machines and pinball machines.
That will exclude many pinball machines.
The studio features several monitors, sports memorabilia, a basketball hoop, a pinball machine, a foosball table, a bar with 3 kegs and a golf simulator.
Their live shows briefly became famous for their use of pinball machines instead of keyboards.
